name: Color Clash Pro
description:
Welcome to the world of colors! In this world you will see each color has its own ego and they don’t want to mingle with other colors at any cost. Now it is your responsibility to match the each color with its own family of same color. Colors are with many shapes and there are four different endless mini games namely Tap Tap, Spin, Classic, Dash and in each mini game you will see different challenges and unique game play.

Tap Tap : In this mode there are set of colors at the bottom and you need to match the same falling colors.

Spin : Set of colors will be spinning at the bottom, tap & Hold to control the spinning of colors and match with the same falling colors.

Classic : This has variety of unique endless stages and it gives you thrill with incremental difficulty as each stage you cross.

Dash : You need to match the falling colors to the set of blocks and it increases difficulty as you go on.

Rich graphics with best blended sound effects makes you feel awesome while playing the game, it is for all the audience from children to family members.
Start love the colors and shapes, you will definitely not disappoint with this game.
